name: Liam_Wilson
content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill

name: Ella_Moore
content: Imagination is the highest kite one can fly. - Lauren Bacall

name: Grace_Campbell
content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs

name: William_Johnson
content: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. - Steve Jobs

name: Ava_Brown
content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. - Eleanor Roosevelt

name: Noah_Miller
content: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. - George R.R. Martin

name: Sophie_Thomas
content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. - Franklin D. Roosevelt
